Crimes.Dispute_Type: Immigration appeal regarding genuineness of marriage
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the IAD's decision that the marriage was not genuine was unreasonable
Crimes.Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations, s 4
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review of IAD decision on visa refusal
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Negative credibility due to use of counterfeit documents and inconsistencies
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Discrepancies in knowledge, finances, communications, and forged documents
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage entered into primarily for immigration purposes
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Use of counterfeit documents and lack of genuine relationship indicators
Crimes.Regulation_Cited: Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations, s 4
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Reasonableness standard applied to factual findings
Crimes.Application_Factor: Genuineness of marriage under IRPA framework
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Unreasonableness of IAD’s credibility and factual findings
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Suspected marriage fraud and document fraud
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Inconsistencies in couple's knowledge and financial interdependence
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Use of counterfeit documents by Mr. Raza
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Significant credibility concerns based on evidence discrepancies
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claim that IAD decision was unreasonable due to misstated facts
Crimes.Relevant_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act and Regulations
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Judicial review of administrative tribunal decision

Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Dispute_Type: Immigration appeal regarding genuineness of marriage
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the IAD's decision that the marriage was not genuine was unreasonable
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review of IAD decision on visa refusal
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Credibility assessed as low based on inconsistencies
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Discrepancies in knowledge, finances, and communication patterns
Crimes.Legal_Provision: IRPA – Misrepresentation and genuineness of marriage
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage not genuine, entered primarily for immigration benefit
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Credibility assessments and lack of shared life indicators
Crimes.Application_Error: Alleged misstatement of facts by IAD
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Reasonableness of IAD’s findings on misrepresentation
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: IRPA – Prohibition on misrepresentation and sham marriages
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Inconsistencies in testimonies and documentary evidence
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge based on alleged factual errors by IAD

Crimes.Crime_Name: Marriage Fraud under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Dispute_Type: Immigration appeal concerning authenticity of marriage
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the IAD's decision that the marriage was not genuine was unreasonable
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review of IAD decision dismissing appeal
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Low credibility due to limited shared life and immigration-focused communications
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Emails focused on immigration, lack of financial interdependence, knowledge gaps
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage entered into primarily to obtain immigration status
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Lack of genuine spousal relationship indicators
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Reasonableness of factual and credibility findings
Crimes.Application_Factor: Nature and progression of the marital relationship
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Reasonableness of IAD’s determination of marriage fraud
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Marriage deemed not genuine, suspected fraud
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Email content, financial separation, lack of cohabitation evidence
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Doubts about authenticity of relationship based on behavioral evidence
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Argument that relationship development was normal and facts were misrepresented
